data.text: @Fatigo_MECFS @GwynneMP @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid @MMissingHolland @MillionMissCan @MillionsMNorway @MillionsMissgFr @MMissingAus @MMissingGermany @millmissmanc @MEActNet It's at least 1.5 million LC now (ONS) so we are looking at over 1.75 million collectively. I suspect the actual figure is nearer 2million as I've seen estimates of ME/cfs of 500k in UK...@UKHSA planning to cut funding for our main source of metrics with 200k new cases per month!

@GwynneMP @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid What I don’t understand is why @Keir_Starmer and @wesstreeting are not pushing harder for research and development in this country. 1.3 million had it by the beginning of 2022 and vast numbers will have added to that list since. WE NEED HELP
@agy_lena @GwynneMP @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid So sorry you have to endure this. Truly awful

@GwynneMP @MECFSNews @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid I’m 30 years with ME imagine decades gaslighted and denied help by DWP & NHS do something now before decades pass for long covid folks too

@GwynneMP @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid Hi @GwynneMP - we are a GM NHS campaign encouraging people to get involved in research. Our #HelpBEATCoronavirus campaign supports researchers to connect with people living with #LongCovid to try and find solutions - It would be great to have you onboard
https://t.co/X4FbsObyd2
@GwynneMP @JanetGunter @UKLabour Fantastic news ☺️ please use your empowered voice to help the 1.3 milion of us who are being left to navigate this devastating illness .

@GwynneMP @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid I can't even look after my own kids now without loads of support and as a lone parent , this is so distressing . Please keep putting the pressure on thankyou #LongCovid #ResearchLongCovid #NHS

@GwynneMP @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid Thankyou so so much for doing this . I am heartbroken that my life has been destroyed by this virus . I was a key worker in a primary school , working at the height of the pandemic .

@GwynneMP @LCNMUK @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid Andrew, thanks so much for attending. Key workers need your help in pushing for tackling ableism and better support in the workplace. @LCNMUK are the organisation for nurses & midwives. We also need to push for #longcovid being classed as occupational disease throughout U.K.
